text: Vot - poslanniki! Odnim my dali preimushchestvo pered drugimi. Ikh nikh byli takiye, s kotorymi govoril Allakh i voznes nekotorykh iz nikh stepenyami. I My darovali Ise, synu Maryam, yasnyye znameniya i podkrepili yego dukhom svyatym. I yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to ne srazhalis' by te, kto byl posle nikh, posle togo, kak prishli k nim yasnyye znameniya. No oni razoshlis', i sredi nikh byli takiye, chto uverovali, i takiye, chto ne verili. A yesli by Allakh pozhelal, to oni ne srazhalis' by, no Allakh delayet to, chto pozhelayet
